Okay i got a task for you to do. The first person to tell me what this binary is gets a silver:

01000011 01101111 01101110 01100111 01110010 01100001 01110100 01110101 01101100 01100001 01110100 01101001 01101111 01101110 01110011 00100001 00100000 01011001 01101111 01110101 00100000 01100111 01100101 01110100 00100000 01110100 01101000 01100101 00100000 01101011 01100001 01110010 01101101 01100001 00100000 01110011 01101001 01101101 01110000 00100000 01100010 01100001 01100100 01100111 01100101 00100001
